Albion Labourer Profit Calculator

A tool to find the best Labourer to use according to real-time prices. For a better experience using it, I recommend using the Albion Data Client to provide the information necessary to use the current market prices. A good video explaining how to use the Albion Data Project for more accurate data.

Payback return period

The number of days to receive your investment back is determined assuming that there are 3 Labourers in the house, and they are 1 level below the house level. For example, if the house is at level 5, the Labourers are level 4.

Material Weighted Cost

The determination of the material weighted cost is done by multiplying the base loot amount by the amount of material returned from the labourer each day (data from the Albion online wiki). The prices in orange mean that that data is not accurate. It is recommended to use the Albion data client to update the data for better results.
